meanings.sent1: Studying harmonics helps us understand how music works.
meanings.sent2: Musicians often explore harmonics to create beautiful melodies.
meanings.sent3: The harmonics of the orchestra seemed to dance in the air.
meanings.sent4: Her voice resonated with harmonics that touched the soul.
meanings.sent5: The harmonics of the piano filled the room with a magical aura.

meanings.definition: A component frequency of a complex wave (especially of a sound wave) that is an integral multiple of the fundamental frequency.
meanings.sent1: The sound engineer adjusted the harmonics to enhance the audio quality.
meanings.sent2: The harmonics in the music added depth and richness to the song.
meanings.sent3: The harmonics of the wave seemed to play a secret melody.
meanings.sent4: His words carried harmonics of truth that resonated with the audience.
meanings.sent5: The harmonics of the guitar string created a symphony of vibrations.
